description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. A retro-inspired, lighthearted action/puzzler with hours of unique gameplay that will put your skills to the test! Explore and solve over 45 levels, find multiple power-ups and hidden areas, create new solutions, and beat your best times. Enter a world where robots have gone amok and it's up to one lone Intern to face impossible odds and rescue them all!
